tool.name: Tandem Repeats Discovery
tool.help:
A tandem repeat is a pattern of two or more nucleotides is repeated and the repetitions are directly adjacent to each other. This tool uses MUMmer package version 3.23 to find all tandem repeats with minimum length N (defined by user, default to be 15)
------------
